sentences.en: B: I was petrified to see a huge rhino bearing down on me.
sentences.cn: 看见一头大犀牛朝我冲过来我都吓坏了.

sentences.en: But critics and environmental groups say poaching is still on the rise in Zimbabwe, especially of the black rhino.
sentences.cn: 但批评家和环境保护组织认为，偷猎在津巴布韦依然有增无减，尤其是狩猎黑犀牛。

sentences.en: Javan rhino is so rare that a sample could not be collected.
sentences.cn: 由于爪哇犀牛十分稀有,因此未能收集到这种犀牛的粪便样本.

sentences.en: Rhino and Mouse are always the best of friends.
sentences.cn: 雷诺与毛斯是最好的朋友.

sentences.en: Run, rhino, run! But this time, you can run free and wild.
sentences.cn: 快跑, 犀牛, 快跑! 但此时, 你可以自由和狂野地奔跑.

sentences.en: She is a pole dancer at London's famous Spearmint Rhino club.
sentences.cn: 她是伦敦著名的“薄荷犀牛”夜总会的钢管舞舞者。

sentences.en: The report notes that rhino populations are increasing in some areas.
sentences.cn: 有报告指出犀牛的数量在一些地区有所增加.

sentences.en: The rhino broke away and ran not at us, but along the rocky bank beside us.
sentences.cn: 这头犀牛突然跑开了,但它没冲着我们跑来, 而是沿着我们旁边的石堤跑了.

sentences.en: The rhino charged headlong towards us.
sentences.cn: 犀牛急速地向我们冲来.

sentences.en: The rhino started to charge, blowing off some eagle feathers.
sentences.cn: 犀牛愤怒地准备进攻了,他气得直冒粗气, 吹掉了几根老鹰的羽毛.

sentences.en: The rhino's most acute sense is smell.
sentences.cn: 犀牛最敏锐的感觉器官是嗅觉.

sentences.en: The savanna browsing black rhino has a prehensile lip for feeding on shrubs.
sentences.cn: 热带大草原的啮草黑犀牛有能卷握东西的嘴唇,可以用于吸食灌木的嫩枝叶.

sentences.en: The situation threatens gains made in its rhino populations in the 1990 s.
sentences.cn: 局势威胁着其1990年代在犀牛数量的收入.

sentences.en: Then the eagles started pulling the rhino's tail.
sentences.cn: 老鹰们开始拽犀牛的尾巴.

sentences.en: They have driven the rhino to the edge of extinction.
sentences.cn: 他们已经令犀牛濒临灭绝。

sentences.en: To summarize the nursing experience of Rhino endoscopic surgery.
sentences.cn: 目的:总结鼻窦内窥镜手术的护理经验.
